Summary I have an overall experience of 16+ years including 12+ years of Web (and Mobile - 1.5 years) development and interaction design focused on Usability and User Experience.  
 
I have expertise in providing technical leadership in Web, RIA and Mobile development in HTML5, CSS 3, JavaScript libraries/frameworks.  
 
I also have experience in establishing UCD process in SDLC (Waterfall and Agile methods). I have good exposure to UX activities such as heuristic evaluation, contextual enquiry, wireframes, prototyping and usability testing.

Summary I am a senior level software engineer with ten years experience in the industry. 
 
I would love to expand my network of professionals and creatives alike to interact and involve myself in professional and independent projects. 
 
I'm a creative and motivated person looking for the next, cool tech to work on. From coding, to user interaction, gaming, to music, I love bringing my skills and passions together to build something great. With my 'eager to try something new' outlook and ability to get things done, I'm ready for each new task. I've launched a successful iOS game, worked with complex internet application middleware, provided user experiences for high traffic web sites and been the face of a band. Summary Total 11+ Years Experience in Interaction Design and Software Industry. 
 
I have got much experience working with HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript / jQuery / xml / Ajax coding, Mobile App UI (iOS, Android and Windows), Site Maintenance & Graphic Production, Branding & Strategy Definition for the Firm, Built CSS Positioned, Table-less Website, PSD to html, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Visualize Concepts Design, Graphic Design, Layout Design, UI Design, Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and including, CMS applications (IBM WebSphere Portal, IBM Web Content Management, Microsoft SharePoint Portal, WordPress, Joomla Other CMS Applications), Published Content in IBM WebSphere Portal, SharePoint Portal & other CMS Applications. Front end Development is my main Specialization. I love Crafting Perfectly Formed Websites. I can create markup from the very beginning, using PSD, AI, PNG, JPGE and other Graphic Files. I provide a Hand-coded, Pixel Perfect, Semantic, valid and Clean, Functional Design and Code. Markup will be Compatible with the following browsers: ie+, FireFox+, Opera+, Safari+, Google Chrome. I have an Experience of Creating Web Apps adjusted for Mobile iPad. 
 
I like to do research in free time to add value in my knowledge base as continuous learning and growth is my passion.

» Email Newsletters Experience Sr. UI/UX / Web & Graphic Designer Saudi Binladin Group April 2012  – Present (3 years 5 months) Saudi Arabia About Company: 
Binladin, the company’s activities expanded from road works and constructions to diversified activities with numerous offshoots worldwide. To prepare for an ambitious and more active international role, the Saudi Binladin Group (SBG) was set up to incorporate various Binladin companies under a single association. 
 
Saudi Binladin Group they are using Sharepoint 2010 for document management system at http://portal.sbg-safety.com/. I have made the theme for this sharepoint site and also I am managing all site content myself. Currently Parallel I am working on upcoming new sharepoint 2010 projects at Saudi binladin Group. New HR Management and employee ID card system projects live soon.

» Microsoft Sharepoint 2010 Theme Designing and Administration.
